channel.title: I need help with Env Variables!
channel.description:
The tutorial for making a server sais (only if you have JDK 6u1) put this in: CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin;%CLASSPATH%; If you have JDK 6u2, you must enter CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin;%CLASSPATH%; for the variable value.
It also sais... (only if you have JDK 6u1) put this in: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin If you have JDK 6u2, you must enter C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin for the variable value.
Now, I have JDK 6u5 what would I put in for the variables?

item.title: I need help with Env Variables!
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Goolo Pure Goolo
item.description:
@Pure_Goolo wrote:

Ohh ok…maybe thats why nobody can join my server or something.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with Env Variables!

item.title: I need help with Env Variables!
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

You would change the 1.6.0_2 into 1.6.0_5.
On both.

Read full topic
